channel.title: I need stats for a good RSC account
channel.description:
I'm kinda quitting RS2 and playing RSC now because it's the runescape I want to play but I'm not getting bored of it.
I was wondering, what skills should I train? What's the best type of account to make? Do range and magic level up your level? Thanks.
Current stats: 3 STR. :)

item.title: I need stats for a good RSC account
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:7, topic:82443”]ahhhh…
good 'ol days of classic…[/quote]

I don’t appreciate you getting post count up here, nor in a mods topic.

I’ll get STR up to 80, mage 80, pray 43~ and 40 ATT, see how that works out.

Read full topic
item.source: I need stats for a good RSC account

item.title: I need stats for a good RSC account
item.dc:creator: @thenoob thenoob
item.description:
@thenoob wrote:

Uuh Def as low as possible ,Pray , High MAGE 80+ High str , And no need for dragon weapons

Read full topic

item.title: I need stats for a good RSC account
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Imk0tter:

sucks that you already got 3 str… you should have gone with a mage pure, 1 65+(def) 1 with 85+mage with god spells

It’s only 1 combat level.

Read full topic

item.title: I need stats for a good RSC account
item.dc:creator: @solemage2 solemage2
item.description:
@solemage2 wrote:

40 att 1 def and 70 str with SS and and super Att, easy 3 hit, once you get these stats you can get range up to around 70 I think or 60-70 and it wont effect you, mage will effect you no matter what…

Read full topic
